NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: MenteeMe will help you to develop successful mentoring experiences. MenteeMe matches you to recommended mentors and facilitates your mentoring relationships.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: A mentee wants to find a mentor. Anybody can be a mentee on MenteeMe. Sign up and look out for recommended mentors.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: A mentor is a credible professional who provides mentoring to others. MenteeMe mentors need to have at least five years of work experience.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: If you have the experience to be a mentor and also want to be mentored you can sign up as both a mentee and a mentor.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5_DESCRIPTION: If you have signed up as both, use The Switcher to toggle between viewing the app as a mentee and a mentor.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE6_DESCRIPTION: Continue to the next screen to begin your journey with MenteeMe.
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
